project.description: This job will archive dbgap previous version for any study type

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: participant_set
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Participant set being archived. If applicable.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 1800 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 mv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/rawData/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/archive/${study_accession,,}/${version}.${participant_set}/rawData/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "${study_accession,,}*"
aws s3 mv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/decoded_data/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/archive/${study_accession,,}/${version}.${participant_set}/decoded_data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "${study_accession,,}*"
# don't archive this as a move as we want to keep current mappings. Only remove if dbgap subject ids have changed in newer version aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/data/${study_abv_name^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/archive/${study_accession,,}/${version}.${participant_set}/data/
aws s3 mv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/completed/${study_accession,,}/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/archive/${study_accession,,}/${version}.${participant_set}/completed/ --recursive
